text: [Zhaijie xu zunxing] yixie guding de rishu. Fan nimen zhong de huan bing zhe huo luxing zhe, zhexie guding de rishu keyong lingwai yixie xiangtong de ri shu lai bu hai. Dui buneng zhaijie zhe [zhu],[mei que yitian zhai de] shujin shi gong yige pinmin yi ri de yinshi. Shei ziyuan duo gei, na dui ta shi zui hao de. Nimen zhaijie dui nimen shi zui hao de, jiaru nimen zhidao.
